item.title: Bio
item.description: My name is Kevin I live in France and currently work for a Paris based startup called travelcar I really like code, and sharing my coding knowledge If you want to discover more of my work, you can check my github Hope you enjoy your stay.

item.title: Instant Alpha on PNG
item.description: Snippet Fish 1 2 3 function instantalpha convert $argv[1] -fuzz $argv[2]% -transparent $argv[3] $argv[1].alpha.png end Bash 1 2 3 function instantalpha { convert "$1" -fuzz "$2"% -transparent "$3" "$1".alpha.png } Usage 1 2 3 4 # file | source png, output will be .alpha.png # -fuzz distance | colors within this distance are considered equal # -transparent color | make this color transparent within the image instantalpha image.
